CustomField.description: Upon a successful match, D&B Connect populates this field that links the Account record to a specific D-U-N-S Number for display of a custom object with D&B data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Upon a successful match, D&B Connect populates this field that links the Account record to a specific D-U-N-S Number for display of a custom object with D&B data.
CustomField.label: D&B Connect Company Profile
